    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: a = np.empty((2, 2)).flat
    4: 
    5: a.base
    6: a.copy()
    7: a.coords
    8: a.index
    9: iter(a)
   10: next(a)
   11: a[0]
   12: a[[0, 1, 2]]
   13: a[...]
   14: a[:]
   15: a.__array__()
   16: a.__array__(np.dtype(np.float64))
   17: 
   18: b = np.array([1]).flat
   19: a[b]
